mapper.select: select c.comment_id,c.comment_star,c.comment_content,c.comment_image,c.comment_reply, t.c_name,u.u_username,c.comment_create_time from f_comment c LEFT JOIN f_takeout_commodity t on c.c_id = t.c_id LEFT JOIN f_user u on c.u_id = u.u_id where c.delete_status = t.delete_status = u.delete_status = 1
mapper.update: update f_comment set delete_status = 0 where delete_status = 1 and comment_id = #{commentId};
